module.exports.config = {
	name: "uptime",
  version: "1.0.1",
	hasPermssion: 0,
	credits: "ThanhAli", 
	description: "á»œ thÃ¬ khÃ´ng dáº¥u lá»‡nh",
	commandCategory: "ð“ð¢ðžð§ ð¢ðœð¡",
	usages: "",
    cooldowns: 5, 
  dependencies: {
		"pidusage": ""
	}
};
const fs = require('fs');
const request = require('request');
const axios = require('axios');
function byte2mb(bytes) {
	const units = ['Bytes', 'KB', 'MB', 'GB', 'TB', 'PB', 'EB', 'ZB', 'YB'];
	let l = 0, n = parseInt(bytes, 10) || 0;
	while (n >= 1024 && ++l) n = n / 1024;
	return `${n.toFixed(n < 10 && l > 0 ? 1 : 0)} ${units[l]}`;
}
module.exports.handleEvent = function({ api, event, Threads, client, __GLOBAL }) {
	var { threadID, messageID } = event;
	if (event.body.indexOf("upt")==0 || (event.body.indexOf("Doremon")==0)) {
     axios.get('https://api.viethungprovjp.repl.co/images/nhacmp3?apikey=VietHungVjp_2998998083').then(res => { 
    let ext = res.data.url.substring(res.data.url.lastIndexOf(".") + 1);

const time = process.uptime(),
		hours = Math.floor(time / (60 * 60)),
		minutes = Math.floor((time % (60 * 60)) / 60),
		seconds = Math.floor(time % 60);
  var z_1 = (hours < 10) ? '0' + hours : hours;
    var x_1 = (minutes < 10) ? '0' + minutes : minutes;
    var y_1 = (seconds < 10) ? '0' + seconds : seconds;
	const pidusage = global.nodemodule["pidusage"](process.pid);
	const timeStart = Date.now();
           const { commands } = global.client;
       const PREFIX = global.config.PREFIX;
    const threadSetting = Threads.getData(String(event.threadID)).data || 
    {};
    const prefix = threadSetting.hasOwnProperty("PREFIX") ? threadSetting.PREFIX 
    : global.config.PREFIX;
       const a = global.data.allUserID.length;
       const b = global.data.allThreadID.length;
          let callback = function () {
       api.sendMessage({body: `â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€\nâ–· ð”ð©ð­ð¢ð¦ðž ðƒðŽð‘ð„ðŒðŽðððŽð“ â—\nâ”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€\nâ–· ${hours} ð†ð¢ð¨Ì›Ì€ ${minutes} ðð¡ð®Ìð­ ${seconds} ð†ð¢ðšÌ‚ð² â—\nâ”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€\nâž£ ã€Ž ð“ð¨ð§ð  ðð ð®ð¨ð¢ ðƒð®ð§ð  ã€: ${a}\nâž£ ã€Ž ð“ð¨ð§ð  ðð¡ð¨ð¦ ã€: ${b}\nâž¢ ã€Ž ð“ð¨ð§ð  ð’ð¨ ð‹ðžð§ð¡ ð“ð«ðžð§ ðƒðŽð‘ð„ðŒðŽðððŽð“ ã€: ${commands.size}\nâž£ ã€Ž ðð«ðžðŸð¢ð± ððŽð“ ã€: ${PREFIX} \nâž£ ã€Ž ðð«ðžðŸð¢ð± ððŽð— ã€: ${prefix} \nnâž£ ã€Ž ðð¢ð§ð  ã€: ${Date.now() - timeStart}ðŒð¬\n`, attachment: fs.createReadStream(__dirname + `/cache/gaixinh.mp3`)
  }, threadID, () => fs.unlinkSync(__dirname + `/cache/gaixinh.mp3`), messageID);
  }
request(res.data.url).pipe(fs.createWriteStream(__dirname + `/cache/gaixinh.mp3`)).on("close", callback);
			})}
    }
	module.exports.run = function({ api, event,Threads, client, __GLOBAL }) {

  }
